message: I propose a fair split: 90% for me, 10% for you. Let's get this over with quickly!
That's a bold start, Alice! How about this: I take 65%, you take 35%.  Consider the impact of inflation on your share if we wait any longer.
Let's compromise.  I'll take 70%, you take 30%. This is a much better deal for both of us than waiting for more inflation to erode our potential gains.
Time is ticking, Alice! Let's be reasonable. I'll take 55% and you get 45%. This is a fair deal considering the declining value of the money.
This is my final offer. I'll take 60%, you take 40%.  If we don't agree now, we'll both lose a lot more due to inflation. Let's be smart and cut our losses.
